org.openimaj.image.feature.global

Enum AvgBrightness.Mode

  • java.lang.Object

    AvgBrightness

    public static enum AvgBrightness.Mode
extends Enum<AvgBrightness.Mode>
    Modes for computing brightness.
    Author:
    Jonathon Hare (jsh2@ecs.soton.ac.uk)

    • Enum Constant Summary

      Enum Constants 
      Enum Constant and Description
      NTSC_LUMINANCE
      Luminance using the NTSC weighting scheme (equivalent to the Y in the YUV colour space)
